name: Led Eyes
tagline: Led Eyes for an Arduino based Robot
body:
## LED Eyes
LED Eyes is a sketch for the Arduino UNO that uses two 8x8 LED Matrixs to display animated eyes.
If it is dark the Robot goes to sleep,
otherwise if someone is close then he goes cross-eyed,
otherwise randomly display shifty, surprised, happy, sad, crying or mad eyes.

### Circuit Layout
The circuit layout has been drawn using Fritzing (http://fritzing.org/):
![](https://github.com/gaz77a/LedEyes/blob/gh-pages/Circuit/LedEyes.jpg?raw=true)

### Authors and Contributors
Initial concept by Gary Butler (@gaz77a).
Mad eyes designed by Gia Rebello.
Reviews provided by Angela Cox and Andre Widjaja.

### Libraries Used
LedControlMS (https://github.com/shaai/Arduino_LED_matrix_sketch/blob/master/LedControlMS.h)
Streaming (http://arduiniana.org/libraries/streaming)
